titleStmt.title: Articles of peace & commerce between the most serene and mighty prince, Charles II ... and the ... Lords Halil Bashaw, Ibraim Dey, Aga, Divan, and governours of the noble city and kingdom of Tripoli in Barbary concluded by Sir John Narbrough ... on the fifth day of March, old stile, 1675/6.
Treaties, etc. Tripoli, 1675 March 5
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
Narbrough, John, Sir, 1640-1688.
Tripoli (Libya). Treaties, etc. England and Wales, 1675 March 5.
